testcase.classname: user should be able to create a new account
testcase.name: user could register to website
testcase.system-out: Given user open browser and goes to register page...........................passed When user selects gender type...............................................passed And user enters "firstName" and "lastLame"..................................passed And user choose date of birth...............................................passed And user enters email address "test@test.com"...............................passed And user enters password fields "123123"....................................passed And user press on register..................................................passed Then register message is displayed "Your registration completed"............passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to login to his account
testcase.name: user login with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed When user enters data "test@test.com" and "123123"..........................passed And user press on login.....................................................passed Then user login successfully................................................passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to login to his account
testcase.name: user login with invalid data

testcase.classname: user should be able to reset his/her password
testcase.name: user will reset password throw the forget password
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to reset password page......................................passed When user enters his/her email "test@test.com"..............................passed And press recover...........................................................passed Then confirmation message is displayed......................................passed

testcase.name: user could search for products name
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged in "test@test.com" and "123123"........................passed When user goes to search bar and enters "phone".............................passed And user clicks on search...................................................passed Then search result will appear..............................................passed But search word can't be less than 3 letters................................passed

testcase.name: user could search for products name 2
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged in "test@test.com" and "123123"........................passed When user goes to search bar and enters "lap"...............................passed And user clicks on search...................................................passed Then search result will appear..............................................passed But search word can't be less than 3 letters................................passed
